name: Plasma Launcher, Disposable, Crewed, Prototype (PDPLC-15)
description: A prototype version of the crewed disposable plasma launcher. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
